meanings.definition: To work again or differently on; revise or improve.
meanings.sent1: She rewrought her essay to make it better for the teacher.
meanings.sent2: The artist rewrought the sculpture to fix a mistake.
meanings.sent3: He rewrought his drawing so many times, it started to look like a different picture.
meanings.sent4: The chef rewrought the recipe until it was perfect, like a masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The tailor rewrought the dress, transforming it into a stunning gown.
